类 BitmapUtils

extends java.lang.Object

    • 方法详细资料

      • recycle

        public static void recycle(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        回收位图资源 Recycle the bitmap with null checks. If the bitmap is already recycled, do nothing.
        参数:
        bitmap - to recycle.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(android.content.ContentResolver resolver,
                                             android.net.Uri uri)
        获取指定uri图片的尺寸大小 Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the Uri.
        参数:
        resolver - the resolver.
        uri - the uri that points to the bitmap.
        返回:
        the size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(java.io.File path)
        获取指定图片文件尺寸 Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the File.
        参数:
        path - the bitmap file path.
        返回:
        the size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(java.lang.String path)
        Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the file path.
        参数:
        path - the bitmap file path.
        返回:
        the size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(byte[] byteArray)
        Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the byte array.
        参数:
        byteArray - the bitmap itself.
        返回:
        the size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(byte[] byteArray,
                                             int offset,
                                             int length)
        获取指定数组位图尺寸 Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the byte array.
        参数:
        byteArray - the bitmap itself.
        offset - offset index.
        length - array length.
        返回:
        the size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(android.content.Context context,
                                             int resId)
        获取指定位图资源id尺寸 Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the resource id.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        resId - the resource id of the drawable.
        返回:
        the drawable bitmap size.

      • getSize

        public static android.graphics.Point getSize(android.content.res.Resources res,
                                             int resId)
        Get width and height of the bitmap specified with the resource id.
        参数:
        res - resource accessor.
        resId - the resource id of the drawable.
        返回:
        the drawable bitmap size.

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                 android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                 int quality)
        压缩位图 Compress the bitmap to the byte array as the specified format and quality.
        参数:
        bitmap - to compress.
        format - the format.
        quality - the quality of the compressed bitmap.
        返回:
        the compressed bitmap byte array.

      • shrink

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap shrink(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                             float scale)
        缩小位图 Shrink the bitmap to the specified scale.
        参数:
        bitmap - to shrink.
        scale - the shrink scale, must be < 1.0.
        返回:
        the shrunk bitmap.

      • expand

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap expand(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                             float scale)
        放大位图 Expand the bitmap to the specified scale.
        参数:
        bitmap - to expand.
        scale - the expand scale, must be > 1.0.
        返回:
        the expanded bitmap.

      • storeOnExternalStorage

        public static java.io.File storeOnExternalStorage(android.content.Context context,
                                                  android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                  java.lang.String type,
                                                  java.lang.String path,
                                                  java.lang.String filename,
                                                  android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                                  int quality)
        存储位图到外部存储路径 Store the bitmap on the external storage path.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        bitmap - to store.
        type - type of the bitmap.
        path - file path.
        filename - file name.
        format - bitmap format.
        quality - the quality of the compressed bitmap.
        返回:
        the compressed bitmap file.

      • storeOnCacheDir

        public static java.io.File storeOnCacheDir(android.content.Context context,
                                           android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                           java.lang.String path,
                                           java.lang.String filename,
                                           android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                           int quality)
        存储位图到cache目录 Store the bitmap on the cache directory path.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        bitmap - to store.
        path - file path.
        filename - file name.
        format - bitmap format.
        quality - the quality of the compressed bitmap.
        返回:
        the compressed bitmap file.

      • storeOnApplicationPrivateDir

        public static boolean storeOnApplicationPrivateDir(android.content.Context context,
                                                   android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                   java.lang.String filename,
                                                   android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                                   int quality)
        存储位图到应用私有目录 Store the bitmap on the application private directory path.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        bitmap - to store.
        filename - file name.
        format - bitmap format.
        quality - the quality of the compressed bitmap.
        返回:
        the compressed bitmap file.

      • storeAsFile

        public static boolean storeAsFile(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                  java.io.File file,
                                  android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat format,
                                  int quality)
        将位图存为图片文件 Store the bitmap as a file.
        参数:
        bitmap - to store.
        format - bitmap format.
        quality - the quality of the compressed bitmap.
        返回:
        the compressed bitmap file.
